extendedInfo.description: Master of  the Newton's laws. Trap particles playing on attraction with your magic fingers. But caution, the time is running fast. You'll have to be very precise and clever to go through with the 30 free levels.More levels and features to come soon in full version.

reviews.comment: Good theory but don\'t like the time limit and frame rate is horribly slow. EVO 3D
reviews.author: A Google User
